name: freightcalculator
description: This project is a freight calculator that chooses between two logistics operators which one has the lowest price and takes the least amount of time to deliver given a source address, a destination address, and product information (dimensions). The project also stores all queries in a database so that they can be consulted later. The frontend is made with ReactJS packaged by Vite and the backend is made with NestJS.

scripts.build-all: npm --prefix ./apps/back run build & npm --prefix ./apps/front run build
scripts.start-all:dev: npm --prefix ./apps/back run start:dev & npm --prefix ./apps/front run dev
scripts.start-all:prod: npm --prefix ./apps/back run start:prod & npm --prefix ./apps/front run preview -- --host

author: Lucas Mella
